This is the first episode on hulu, but it is missing what I thought was the most funny joke in the first episode.  It was when archer is confronting the isis mainframe door.  It was on hulu but not in this episode.
Also, I went on the official website, evidently hulu, and this torrent host, mixed up episode 1 and 2.

According to tv.com, Mole Hunt _is_ the first episode. To the best of my knowledge there was an unaired pilot, only available on the dvd. I believe this could be it:
